title: Federal Depts. Are Out of Control | Guests: Sen. Rand Paul & Rep. Stewart | 1/12/22
description:
Glenn discusses Ted Cruz questioning an FBI official regarding the FBI's alleged involvement on January 6. Rep. Chris Stewart calls in to discuss the threat of Vladimir Putin invading Ukraine and reordering the European nation. Justin Haskins, editorial director of the Heartland Institute and co-author of “The Great Reset,” joins to discuss the book, what the Great Reset is, and how it's coming sooner rather than later. Former Department of Education press secretary Angela Morabito joins to discuss the Department of Education denying Miguel Cardona’s role in targeting parents. Sen. Rand Paul joins to discuss his questioning of Dr. Fauci over the leaked emails that indicate Dr. Fauci knew more about the origin of COVID than he’s been claiming.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
